original_body_lines: The Anti-Corruption Bill has been tabled in Parliament by Justice Minister Wijeyadasa Rajapaksa, a short while ago.
Parliament Sittings commenced today (27) at 09.30 a.m. with time allotted for Questions for Oral Answers from 09.30 a.m. to 10.30 a.m.

Thereafter, from 10.30 a.m. to 5.00 p.m. the debate on Resolution for the implementation of the arrangement under the Extended Fund Facility (EFF) of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) for Sri Lanka is to be held.
Thereafter, Motion at the Adjournment Time by the Opposition will be debated from 5.00 p.m. to 5.30 p.m.
